Subjects: Trevisa, verses in Polychronicon; England; chronicles, verse in
_description: Verses in praise of England, in Trevisa’s trans of Higden’s Polychronicon, Book I, ch. 41, translating Trevisa’s verses, ‘Anglia terra ferax et fertilis angulus orbis…’ — twenty couplets, partly prosified

CamStJohn204.First Lines:
Engelond is good londfruytful of þe wolle but
                    acorner…
CamStJohn204.Last Lines:
…Riches þat þere is anȝern wolde
                    octauian
CamStJohn204.Note:
Twenty couplets, including 13 couplets formerly
                    listed as 5041.
